channel.title: Markdowns on Walmo SDLC Test
channel.description: Recent content in Markdowns on Walmo SDLC Test

item.title: Flowcharts Notes
item.description: Straight html <div class="mermaid"> graph LR; A-->B; </div> Mermaid not rendering yet!!! graph LR; A[Hard edge] --|Link text| B(Round edge) B -- C{Decision} C --|One| D[Result one] C --|Two| E[Result two] Used external website to create png Rendering from local png files /content/markdown/flowcharts/name.png as referenced from flowcharts.md file m1.png m2.png From online link

item.title: Markdown Notes
item.description: Tables You can create tables by assembling a list of words and dividing them with hyphens - (for the first row), and then separating each column with a pipe |: so this First Header | Second Header ------------ | ------------- Content from cell 1 | Content from cell 2 Content in the first column | Content in the second column Renders as this First Header Second Header Content from cell 1 Content from cell 2 Content in the first column Content in the second column
